timeline.bodyText: Can we have a static JsonParser that is allocated once in a separate Util class and reused by both these Action classes?
timeline.author: sidheart

timeline.bodyText: I can see why you want to put this single static parser in one place. Is this the right class for it though? Should we move it to some util?
timeline.author: vigyasharma

replies.bodyText:
Right. Moving it to util is a good idea. Will merge this (unblock other build issues) and address this as a part of my next PR.
This issue will be resolved once we upgrade the dependency version.
replies.author: sruti1312
